name: Sacred Four
description: "Ziegwen" a godly sword on a chain which, once you release it, flies through the air like a flash of light to destroy evil. Master control of "Ziegwen" to fight monsters in this new style of VR action game!
minimum_requirements: OS: 7/8/10 Processor: Intel i5-4590 equivalent or greater Memory: 8 GB RAM Graphics: Nvidia GeForce GTX 970 / AMD Radeon R9 290 equivalent or greater Storage: 1.2 GB available space
